alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Claiborne; Grainger; Union (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 3:43PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Claiborne, east central Campbell, northwestern Grainger and central Union Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 443 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles east of La Follette, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rutledge, New Tazewell, Tazewell, Springdale, Lone Mountain, Rose Hill, Norris Lake, Sharps Chapel, Sandlick and Big Ridge State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
